TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit TypeDescriptionProvider extends System.Object

summary.span: 向 提供补充元数据。

span.span: Provides supplemental metadata to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类通过添加、修改或隐藏特性、属性和事件等特性，动态扩展与类型或对象关联的类型信息。The class dynamically extends the type information associated with a type or object by adding, modifying, or hiding characteristics such as attributes, properties, and events. 可以有多个类型说明提供程序类，它们向单个提供元数据 。There can be multiple type description provider classes that offer metadata to a single . 将与关联的方法有两种 ：There are two ways to associate a with a : - 在设计时，可以向目标类分配适当的 标记。At design time, when the target class can be assigned the appropriate tag. - 在运行时， 可以调用类的方法之一。At run time, when one of the methods of the class can be called. 这些重载方法需要目标对象或其类类型。These overloaded methods require either the target object or its class type. 类依赖于在构造期间提供的同一类型的父对象。The class relies on a parent object of the same type, supplied during construction. 这允许派生自的类 有选择地重写方法。This allows classes that derive from to selectively override methods. 的实例 只按需求建立，最大程度地降低自定义类型信息对性能的影响。Instances of are only built upon demand, minimizing the impact of custom type information on performance.

para.span: 派生类型可能标记为 或 ，但可以使用类创建类型的实例 。

span.span: Your derived type might be marked as or , but an instance of your type can be created with the class.

para.span: 如果调用方是受信任的，请勿编写不安全代码。

span.span: Do not write insecure code by assuming the caller is trusted.

para.span: 假定调用方可以在部分信任环境中创建类型的实例。

span.span: Assume instead that callers might create instances of your type in partial trust.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 `parent` 参数为 `null` ，则所有 方法都将返回默认值。If the `parent` parameter is `null`, all methods will return default values. 否则，所有 方法都将委托给的方法 `parent` 。Otherwise, all methods will delegate to the methods of `parent`. 下表显示了方法的默认返回值 。The following table shows the default return values for methods. |方法Method|默认返回值Default return value| |------------|--------------------------| ||`null`| ||通过调用方法的新创建的对象 。A newly created object through a call to the method.| ||类的默认实例 。A default instance of a class.| ||类的默认实例 。A default instance of a class.| ||`objectType`第一个参数。The `objectType` first parameter.|

summary.span: 创建可替换为另一种数据类型的对象。

span.span: Creates an object that can substitute for another data type.
The substitute .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由 参数指定的由 `provider` 类的 方法传入 。The specified by the `provider` parameter is passed in by the method of the class. 如果不 `provider` 为 `null` ，则类型说明提供程序可以使用服务提供程序来获取有关创建调用的其他上下文。If `provider` is not `null`, the service provider can be used by the type description provider to obtain additional context about the creation call. 如果为，则方法为， `virtual` 并且在默认情况下，返回方法的结果 `provider` `null` 。The method is `virtual` and, by default, returns the result of the method if `provider` is `null`. 如果 `provider` 为 `null` ，则此方法将调用 父提供程序的方法。If `provider` is `null`, this method will invoke the method of the parent provider.

para.span: 如果派生类不感兴趣提供替换实例，则它应只调用基实现。

span.span: If the derived class is not interested in providing a substitute instance, it should just call the base implementation.

summary.span: 获取每个对象均对应有的缓存，此缓存可作为键/值对的 进行访问。

span.span: Gets a per-object cache, accessed as an of key/value pairs.

returns.span: 如果提供的对象支持缓存，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: An if the provided object supports caching; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可能需要对元数据集合执行复杂的操作。A may need to perform complex operations on collections of metadata. 由于在域的生存期内不会卸载类型，因此 类将基于类型自动缓存这些操作的结果。Because types are not unloaded for the life of a domain, the class will automatically cache the results of these operations based on type. 但某些操作使用活动对象实例。However, some operations use live object instances. 这些操作不能缓存在类中， 因为缓存它们会阻止对象被垃圾回收。These operations cannot be cached within the class because caching them would prevent the object from being garbage collected. 相反， 类允许将每对象缓存作为 键/值对的访问，以存在于对象上。Instead, the class allows for a per-object cache, accessed as an of key/value pairs, to exist on an object. 方法返回此缓存的实例。The method returns an instance of this cache. `null` 如果对象不支持缓存，则方法将返回。The method will return `null` if there is no supported cache for an object. 使用的默认值 检查对象，以查看它是否是实现接口的已占位组件 。The default used by examines the object to see if it is a sited component that implements the interface. 如果对象为，则它将使用字典服务来存储对象的缓存。If the object is, it uses the dictionary service to store the object's cache. 否则为它返回的对象 `null` 。Otherwise, the object it returns `null`. 其他类型说明提供程序可在此处提供自己的实现。Other type description providers may provide their own implementation here. 例如，依赖对象只能附加类型为的属性 。For example, dependency objects can just attach a property of type .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor GetExtendedTypeDescriptor (object instance);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor GetExtendedTypeDescriptor(object instance) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetExtendedTypeDescriptor (instance As Object) As ICustomTypeDescriptor
public: virtual System::ComponentModel::ICustomTypeDescriptor ^ GetExtendedTypeDescriptor(System::Object ^ instance);
abstract member GetExtendedTypeDescriptor : obj -> System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor override this.GetExtendedTypeDescriptor : obj -> System.ComponentModel.ICustomTypeDescriptor

param.name: instance
param.span: 要为其获取扩展类型说明符的对象。

span.span: The object for which to get the extended type descriptor.

summary.span: 为给定的对象获取扩展的自定义类型说明符。

span.span: Gets an extended custom type descriptor for the given object.

returns.span: 可以为对象提供扩展元数据的 。

span.span: An that can provide extended metadata for the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 扩展类型说明符是一种自定义类型描述符，它提供其他对象已添加到此对象中但尚未在对象上实际定义的属性。An extended type descriptor is a custom type descriptor that offers properties that other objects have added to this object, but that are not actually defined on the object. 例如，在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 组件模型中，实现接口的对象 可以将属性附加到驻留在同一逻辑容器中的其他对象。For example, in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] component model, objects that implement the interface can attach properties to other objects that reside in the same logical container. 重载 方法不返回提供这些额外扩展属性的类型描述符。The overloaded methods do not return a type descriptor that provides these extra extended properties. 方法返回这些扩展属性集。The method returns the set of these extended properties. 将自动合并这两个属性集合的结果。The will automatically merge the results of these two property collections. 当 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 组件模型仅支持扩展属性时， 如果类型说明提供程序支持，则可用于扩展属性和事件。While the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] component model supports only extended properties, can be used for extended attributes as well as events, if the type description provider supports it. 为， `virtual` 并且默认情况下，如果未传递父提供程序，则返回返回空结果的自定义类型描述符。 is `virtual` and, by default, returns a custom type descriptor that returns empty results if no parent provider was passed. 如果传递了父提供程序，则此方法将调用父提供程序的 方法。If a parent provider was passed, this method will invoke the parent provider's method.
